attributes.action: levy a retrospective tax on bankers bonuses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reckless policies followed by the banking sector over the past 20 years have brought this country to the brink of bankruptcy and will cause significant hardship to the population for years to come. Banking Fat Cats have in effect been paid vast sums in bonuses in return for providing incompetent  management. Shareholders and savers have lost money and many borrowers will lose their homes. The government should impose a statutory liability on those who have lead us into this mess to pay their ill gotten gains into a compensation fund.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
